org.fluidity.foundation

extends Utility
    Utility methods related to class loaders.

      • CLASS_SUFFIX

        public static final String CLASS_SUFFIX
        The .class suffix of Java class files.

        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • findClassLoader

        public static ClassLoader findClassLoader(Class type,
                                          boolean fallback)
        Finds the class loader appropriate for the given class. Here, the term appropriate means:
        • the thread context class loader, if given and fallback is true
        • else the class loader that loaded the supplied class, if not null
        • else if fallback is true, the class loader that loaded this class, if not null
        • else the system class loader.
        NOTE: The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" permission.
        Parameters:
        type - the class to find the appropriate class loader for.
        fallback - if true, the context class loader and the class loader of this utility class may be returned.
        Returns:
        the class loader appropriate for the given class.

      • absoluteResourceName

        public static String absoluteResourceName(String format,
                                          Object... params)
        Returns the name that can be fed to ClassLoader.findResource() and ClassLoader.findResources(). The resource name is computed from a format string and its parameters.
        Parameters:
        format - the format string.
        params - the parameters of the format string.
        Returns:
        the resource name that can be used with ClassLoader methods.

      • findResource

        public static URL findResource(Class type,
                               String format,
                               Object... params)
        Finds the named resource in the class loader appropriate for the given class. See ClassLoaders.findClassLoader(type, true) for the definition of appropriate. The resource name is computed from a format string and its parameters.

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" permission.

        Parameters:
        type - the class to use the appropriate class loader for.
        format - the format string.
        params - the parameters of the format string.
        Returns:
        the URL for the resource, or null if the resource could not be found.

      • findResources

        public static Collection<URL> findResources(ClassLoader loader,
                                            String format,
                                            Object... params)
                                     throws IOException
        Finds the named resources in the given class loader. The resource name is computed from a format string and its parameters. The returned list will not contain duplicates.
        Parameters:
        loader - the class loader.
        format - the format string.
        params - the parameters of the format string.
        Returns:
        the list of URLs for the resource; possibly empty.
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O exception occurs.

      • readResource

        public static InputStream readResource(Class type,
                                       String format,
                                       Object... params)
        Finds the named resource in the class loader appropriate for the given class and returns an input stream to read its contents. See ClassLoaders.findClassLoader(type, true) for the definition of appropriate. The resource name is computed from a format string and its parameters.

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" permission.

        Parameters:
        type - the class to use the appropriate class loader for.
        format - the format string.
        params - the parameters of the format string.
        Returns:
        the input stream for the resource, or null if the resource could not be found.

      • classResourceName

        public static String classResourceName(Class type)
        Returns the resource name for the given class. The resource name is the value to feed to ClassLoader.findResource() to find the URL where the class may be loaded from. The method ClassLoader.findClassResource() calls that method with the output of this one.
        Parameters:
        type - the class to return the resource name of.
        Returns:
        a string, never null.

      • classResourceName

        public static String classResourceName(String type)
        Returns the resource name for the given class name. The resource name is the value to feed to ClassLoader.findResource() to find the URL where the class may be loaded from.
        Parameters:
        type - the name of the class to return the resource name of.
        Returns:
        a string, never null.

      • findClassResource

        public static URL findClassResource(Class type)
        Returns the resource URL where the given class may be loaded from.

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" permission.

        Parameters:
        type - the class to return the resource URL for.
        Returns:
        the resource URL for the given class.

      • readClassResource

        public static InputStream readClassResource(Class type)
        Returns the input stream where the given class may be loaded from.

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" permission.

        Parameters:
        type - the class to return the resource URL for.
        Returns:
        the input stream for the given class.

      • set

        public static ClassLoader set(Class type)
        Sets as the context class loader the one that loaded the given class and returns the previous context class loader.

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" and RuntimePermission "setContextClassLoader" permissions.

        Parameters:
        type - the class loader to set.
        Returns:
        the previous class loader.

      • context

        public static <R,E extends Exception> R context(ClassLoader loader,
                                                Command.Function<R,ClassLoader,E> command)
                                         throws E extends Exception
        Establishes the given class loader as the context class loader, executes the given command, and then establishes the previous context class loader before returning whatever the command returned, or throwing whatever the command threw.

        The caller must have the RuntimePermission "getClassLoader" and RuntimePermission "setContextClassLoader" permissions.

        Usage

         final ClassLoader loader = …;

 final boolean success = ClassLoaders.context(loader, _loader -> {
   … // call some library that uses the thread context class loader
   return true;
 });
        Type Parameters:
        R - the return type of the command.
        E - the type of the exception thrown by the command.
        Parameters:
        loader - the class loader to set as the context class loader.
        command - the command to execute with the given class loader as the context class loader.
        Returns:
        whatever the command returns.
        Throws:
        E - from the command.
        E extends Exception

      • create

        public static ClassLoader create(Collection<URL> urls,
                                 ClassLoader parent,
                                 URLStreamHandlerFactory handlers)
        Creates a class loader with the given URLs.
        Parameters:
        urls - the list of URLs; may not be null.
        parent - the parent class loader; may be null.
        handlers - the optional URL stream handler factory; may be null.
        Returns:
        a class loader that loads classes from the given URLs.

      • create

        public static ClassLoader create(Collection<URL> urls,
                                 URLStreamHandlerFactory handlers)
        Creates a class loader with the given URLs. The parent class loader of the returned class loader with be the system class loader.
        Parameters:
        urls - the list of URLs; may not be null.
        handlers - the optional URL stream handler factory; may be null.
        Returns:
        a class loader that loads classes from the given URLs.
